sentences.en: A new on - line measurement approach for pellet density was presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种在线测量球团密度的新方法.

sentences.en: A porous pellet was fabricated by the well - known wash - out process.
sentences.cn: 用熟知的浸洗办法制出带孔的药丸.

sentences.en: Center - filled gum - Pellet or ball gum formed around a soft or liquid centre.
sentences.cn: 甜心口香糖 — 球状口香糖,馅心是软的或液体的.

sentences.en: Do not transfer any material from the white pellet.
sentences.cn: 请不要吸到任何来自白色沉淀物的东西.

sentences.en: Each pellet was placed in the end of a shotshell.
sentences.cn: 每个点火药片放在实验弹的一端.

sentences.en: For pellet mill, extruder , hammer mill, pulverizer, crumbler, rotary screener.
sentences.cn: 制粒机 、 膨化机 、 粉碎机 、 微粉碎机、破碎机 、 分级筛等设备配件、易损件.

sentences.en: Objective To study the optimal technology and formula for the pellet preparation.
sentences.cn: 目的研究微丸制备的最佳工艺和处方.

sentences.en: Something, such as a baseball, that resembles a pellet of medicine.
sentences.cn: 丸状物, 小球象药丸一样的东西, 如棒球.

sentences.en: Such designs were square, diamond , triangular or hexagonal shaped pellet areas.
sentences.cn: 这些设计是正方形的, 菱形的, 三角形的或六角形的小格区域.

sentences.en: The " Flashar " incorporates a platinum pellet.
The core pellet is placed in a chamber.
The pellet with the poison's in the vessel with the pestle?
sentences.cn: 带有毒药的小球放在带有杵的容器里?

sentences.en: This product has the multi - pore structure with the cream color translucent pellet.
sentences.cn: 本品为乳白色半透明颗粒,具有多微孔结构.

sentences.en: This stops the sound and releases a food pellet.
sentences.cn: 这一按,声音停止,并有一团食物递送出来.

sentences.en: You centrifuge the solution, decant the supernatant, and discard the pellet.
sentences.cn: 你然后对溶液离心, 慢慢倒出上清,弃沉淀.对上清液你加更多的硫酸铵.

phrases.tran_cn: 制粒设备；制片机；制丸磨；饲料压粒机

trans.tran_cn: 小球，小子弹，石弹，炮弹，（货币等的）圆浮雕
trans.tran_en: a small ball of a substance
